name: Grimlock
description: Grimlocks are blind, leathery-skinned humanoids with pale gray skin. They dwell in the Underdark and are known for their primitive and savage nature.
memorable: Grimlocks utilize their heightened hearing and smell to become effective hunters despite their blindness, employing ambush tactics in packs.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey in the dark tunnels of the Underdark.
relations: They are often encountered in packs and might be found in the company of other Underdark creatures.
environment: Grimlocks typically inhabit the shadowy and rocky terrain of the Underdark.
strengths: Their keen senses, particularly hearing and smell, make them formidable hunters; they are adept at camouflage in rocky environments.
weaknesses: They are vulnerable when deafened or unable to smell, severely limiting their perception.
attacks: The Grimlock attacks with a spiked club and can grapple an opponent, preventing them from breathing.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Hearing and Smell, granting them advantage on perception checks relying on these senses.
senses: Grimlocks have blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing them to detect movement in total darkness.
skills: They excel in athletics, stealth, and engineering, showcasing their physical prowess.
additional_information: Camouflage allows them to hide effectively in rocky areas.
They can use a special ability called Strange Bauble to create illusions that can blind or frighten targets.
Immunity to blindness enhances their survival in dark environments.
test_queries: blind primitive humanoid that ambushes prey
savage creature with keen senses in darkness
Underdark humanoid that uses brutal tactics
tactically aware monster with blind senses
